T06bsa030_u:1611: satvapākasya niṣpattirjāyate ca tataḥ param // MSA_20.13 //
T06bsa030_u:1617: saṃpūrṇakāyaśca nidarśane ca śakto 'bhiṣiktaḥ khalu bodhisatvaḥ // MSA_20.16 //
T06bsa030_u:1642: nācchando na ca lubdhahrasvahṛdayo na krodhano nālaso nāmaitrīkarūṇāśayo na kumatiḥ kalpairvikalpairhataḥ /
T06bsa030_u:1643: no vikṣiptamatiḥ sukhairna ca hato duḥkhairna vā [vyā]vartate satyaṃ mitramupāśritaḥ śrutaparaḥ pūjāparaḥ śāstari // MSA_20.29 //
T06bsa030_u:1644: sarvaṃ puṇyasamuccayaṃ suvipulaṃ kṛtvānyasādhāraṇaṃ saṃbodhau pariṇāmayatyaharaharyo hyuttamopāyavit /
T06bsa030_u:1645: jātaḥ svāyatane sadā śubhakaraḥ krīḍatyabhijñāguṇaiḥ sarveṣāmuparisthito guṇanidhirjñeyaḥ sa buddhātmanaḥ // MSA_20.30 //
T06bsa030_u:1649: tīvra utpadyate modo muditā tena kathyate // MSA_20.32 //
T06bsa030_u:1655: dhīmadbhirjīyate duḥkhaṃ durjayā tena kathyate // MSA_20.35 //
T06bsa030_u:1665: bhūtāmitābhayārthāya ta eveṣṭā hi bhūmayaḥ // MSA_20.40 //
T06bsa030_u:1674: jñānena jñeyaṃ vyāptaṃ te muktacitta namo 'stute // MSA_20.44 //
T06bsa030_u:1678: sadaiva sarvapraśnānāṃ visarjaka namo 'stu te // MSA_20.46 //
T06bsa030_u:1679: āśraye 'thāśrite deśye vākye jñāne ca deśike /
T06bsa030_u:1682: niḥ sāre caiva satvānāṃ svavavāda namo 'stu te // MSA_20.48 //
T06bsa030_u:1688: mahāyāne ca niryāṇe mārabhañja namo 'stu te // MSA_20.51 //
T06bsa030_u:1692: nirārakṣa asaṃmoṣa gaṇakarṣa namo 'stu te // MSA_20.53 //
T06bsa030_u:1694: sarvadā tava sarvajña bhūtārthika namo 'stu te // MSA_20.54 //
T06bsa030_u:1698: mahākaruṇayā yukta hitāśaya namo 'stu te // MSA_20.56 //
T06bsa030_u:1702: sarvatra sarvasatvānāṃ kāṅkṣāchida namo 'stu te // MSA_20.58 //
T06bsa030_u:1704: āniṅkṣya sarvadharmeṣu niṣprapañca namo 'stu te // MSA_20.59 //
